# Example use cases

- [Install the MacOS Application](#install-the-macos-application)

## Ask questions on folder contents

Turn any folder into a local knowledgebase that you can ask questions on.

<video src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/1095431/301758196-bb0ff036-5264-4b35-a77e-64e7346544df.mp4?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..nZPTfHjZ9ZrShPIcIenVgXelL91vrmKx5eSUZSkXHow" muted loop controls>
  <p>
    Your browser doesn't support HTML video. Here is a
    <a href="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/1095431/301758196-bb0ff036-5264-4b35-a77e-64e7346544df.mp4?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..nZPTfHjZ9ZrShPIcIenVgXelL91vrmKx5eSUZSkXHow">link to the demo video</a> instead.
  </p>
</video>
